product_name: Rip Curl Trestles Oceansearch Watch - Men's
long_description: Designed for surfers, the Rip Curl Trestles Oceansearch Watch helps ensure you'll be riding the waves in the right place at the right time with its auto tide system and dual time function. Pre-programmed tide charts include over 200 preset beach locations worldwide; they display tide height and range with up to 10 years of future tide information. Large digital display shows time, date, tide time and height, and moon phase. Dual time function features an alarm for each time zone. Also features a stopwatch, countdown timer and backlight. Tough ABS plastic construction and polyurethane band stand up to saltwater exposure. The Rip Curl Trestles Oceansearch Watch resists water to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: Designed for surfers, the Rip Curl Trestles Oceansearch Watch helps ensure you'll be riding the waves in the right place at the right time with its auto tide system and dual time function.
